ValidationRule.description: Parent Opportunity is required on change orders when the opp is closed/won.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND ( CloseDate>=DATE(2019,01,01), ISPICKVAL(Project_Type__c, "Change Order"), ISBLANK(Parent_Opportunity__c), OR( ISPICKVAL(StageName , "6 Negotiating" ), ISPICKVAL(StageName , "7 Verbal Agreement" ), ISPICKVAL(StageName , "8 Closed Won" ) ) ) && $Profile.Name != "System Administrator"
